quote.issued_shares_note: The number of issued shares has been adjusted for the announced rights issue of 3 rights shares for every 10 existing shares with an ex-date of 25 August 2025. The number of issued shares before the adjustment is 491,644,763 shares as at 31 August 2025.
quote.summary: China Health Group Ltd is an investment holding company principally engaged in the distribution of medical equipment and consumables. The Company operates its business through four segments. The Distribution and Service in Medical Equipment and Consumables segment is engaged in the distribution and service of cardiovascular medical devices and consumables such as stents, pacemakers as well as others. The Hospital Operation and Management Services segment is engaged in the operation and management of hospitals. The Research and Development and Sale of Functional Food segment is engaged in the research, development and sale functional foods. The Business Service segment is engaged in the provision of hospital management consulting services.
